name: Video ads
description: Adds an option to remove ads in the video player.

name: Hide ads
description: Adds options to remove general ads.

name: Spoof device dimensions
description: Adds an option to spoof the device dimensions which unlocks higher video qualities if they aren't available on the device.

name: Always repeat
description: Adds an option to always repeat videos when they end.

name: Minimized playback
description: Unlocks options for picture-in-picture and background playback.

name: Remove tracking query parameter
description: Adds an option to remove the tracking info from links you share.

name: Announcements
description: Adds an option to show announcements from ReVanced on app startup.

name: Bypass URL redirects
description: Adds an option to bypass URL redirects and open the original URL directly.

name: Open links externally
description: Adds an option to always open links in your browser instead of in the in-app-browser.

name: GmsCore support
description: Allows patched Google apps to run without root and under a different package name by using GmsCore instead of Google Play Services.

options.title: GmsCore Vendor
options.description: The group id of the GmsCore vendor.

name: Client spoof
description: Adds options to spoof the client to allow video playback.

name: Disable zoom haptics
description: Adds an option to disable haptics when zooming.

name: Enable debugging
description: Adds options for debugging.

name: HDR auto brightness
description: Adds an option to make the brightness of HDR videos follow the system default.

name: Restore old video quality menu
description: Adds an option to restore the old video quality menu with specific video resolution options.

name: Playback speed
description: Adds options to customize available playback speeds and to remember the last playback speed selected.

name: Remember video quality
description: Adds an option to remember the last video quality selected.

name: Enable slide to seek
description: Adds an option to enable slide to seek instead of playing at 2x speed when pressing and holding in the video player.  Including this patch may cause issues with tapping or double tapping the video player overlay.

name: Disable precise seeking gesture
description: Adds an option to disable precise seeking when swiping up on the seekbar.

name: Seekbar tapping
description: Adds an option to enable tap-to-seek on the seekbar of the video player.

name: Remove viewer discretion dialog
description: Adds an option to remove the dialog that appears when opening a video that has been age-restricted by accepting it automatically. This does not bypass the age restriction.

name: External downloads
description: Adds support to download and save YouTube videos using an external downloader app.

name: Copy video URL
description: Adds options to display buttons in the video player to copy video URLs.

name: Swipe controls
description: Adds options to enable and configure volume and brightness swipe controls.

name: Restore old seekbar thumbnails
description: Adds an option to restore the old seekbar thumbnails that appear above the seekbar while seeking instead of fullscreen thumbnails.

name: Disable player popup panels
description: Adds an option to disable panels (such as live chat) from opening automatically.

name: Change header
description: Applies a custom header in the top left corner within the app. Defaults to the ReVanced header.

options.title: Header
options.description:
The header to apply to the app.

If a path to a folder is provided, the folder must contain one or more of the following folders, depending on the DPI of the device:

- drawable-xxxhdpi
- drawable-xxhdpi
- drawable-xhdpi
- drawable-hdpi
- drawable-mdpi

Each of the folders must contain all of the following files:

- yt_wordmark_header_light.png
- yt_wordmark_header_dark.png

The image dimensions must be as follows:
- drawable-xxxhdpi: 512px x 192px
- drawable-xxhdpi: 387px x 144px
- drawable-xhdpi: 258px x 96px
- drawable-hdpi: 194px x 72px
- drawable-mdpi: 129px x 48px

name: Custom branding
description: Applies a custom app name and icon. Defaults to "YouTube ReVanced" and the ReVanced logo.

options.title: App name
options.description: The name of the app.

options.title: App icon
options.description:
The icon to apply to the app.

If a path to a folder is provided, the folder must contain the following folders:

- mipmap-xxxhdpi
- mipmap-xxhdpi
- mipmap-xhdpi
- mipmap-hdpi
- mipmap-mdpi

Each of these folders must contain the following files:

- adaptiveproduct_youtube_background_color_108.png
- adaptiveproduct_youtube_foreground_color_108.png
- ic_launcher.png
- ic_launcher_round.png

name: Enable tablet layout
description: Adds an option to spoof the device form factor to a tablet which enables the tablet layout.

name: Wide searchbar
description: Adds an option to replace the search icon with a wide search bar. This will hide the YouTube logo when active.

name: Tablet mini player
description: Adds an option to enable the tablet mini player layout.

name: Hide captions button
description: Adds an option to hide the captions button in the video player.

name: Hide autoplay button
description: Adds an option to hide the autoplay button in the video player.

name: Hide cast button
description: Adds an option to hide the cast button in the video player.

name: Hide player buttons
description: Adds an option to hide the previous and next buttons in the video player.

name: Navigation buttons
description: Adds options to hide and change navigation buttons (such as the Shorts button).

name: Hide video action buttons
description: Adds options to hide action buttons (such as the Download button) under videos.

name: Custom player overlay opacity
description: Adds an option to change the opacity of the video player background when player controls are visible.

name: Remove player controls background
description: Removes the dark background surrounding the video player controls.

name: SponsorBlock
description: Adds options to enable and configure SponsorBlock, which can skip undesired video segments such as sponsored content.

name: Alternative thumbnails
description: Adds options to replace video thumbnails using the DeArrow API or image captures from the video.

name: Disable resuming Shorts on startup
description: Adds an option to disable the Shorts player from resuming on app startup when Shorts were last being watched.

name: Theme
description: Adds options for theming and applies a custom background theme (dark background theme defaults to amoled black).

options.title: Dark theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#AARRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

options.title: Light theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#AARRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

name: Spoof app version
description: Adds an option to trick YouTube into thinking you are running an older version of the app. This can be used to restore old UI elements and features.

name: Change start page
description: Adds an option to set which page the app opens in instead of the homepage.

name: Hide seekbar
description: Adds an option to hide the seekbar.

name: Comments
description: Adds options to hide components related to comments.

name: Hide breaking news shelf
description: Adds an option to hide the breaking news shelf on the homepage tab.

name: Hide Shorts components
description: Adds options to hide components related to YouTube Shorts.

name: Disable rolling number animations
description: Adds an option to disable rolling number animations of video view count, user likes, and upload time.

name: Hide floating microphone button
description: Adds an option to hide the floating microphone button when searching.

name: Hide endscreen cards
description: Adds an option to hide suggested video cards at the end of videos.

name: Hide crowdfunding box
description: Adds an option to hide the crowdfunding box between the player and video description.

name: Disable suggested video end screen
description: Adds an option to disable the suggested video end screen at the end of videos.

name: Disable fullscreen ambient mode
description: Adds an option to disable the ambient mode when in fullscreen.

name: Hide 'Load more' button
description: Adds an option to hide the button under videos that loads similar videos.

name: Hide album cards
description: Adds an option to hide album cards below artist descriptions.

name: Hide filter bar
description: Adds options to hide the category bar at the top of video feeds.

name: Player flyout menu
description: Adds options to hide menu items that appear when pressing the gear icon in the video player.

name: Hide layout components
description: Adds options to hide general layout components.

name: Hide timestamp
description: Adds an option to hide the timestamp in the bottom left of the video player.

name: Hide info cards
description: Adds an option to hide info cards that creators add in the video player.

name: Disable auto captions
description: Adds an option to disable captions from being automatically enabled.

name: Return YouTube Dislike
description: Adds an option to show the dislike count of videos using the Return YouTube Dislike API.

name: Hide story ads
description: Hides the ads in the Facebook app stories.

name: Disable blog notification reminder
description: Disables the reminder to enable notifications for blogs you visit.

name: Disable in-app update
description: Disables the in-app update check and update prompt.

name: Disable gift message popup
description: Disables the popup suggesting to buy TumblrMart items for other people.

name: Disable Tumblr Live
description: Disable the Tumblr Live tab button and dashboard carousel.

name: Disable dashboard ads
description: Disables ads in the dashboard.

name: Disable typing indicator
description: Disables the indicator while typing a message.

name: Disable switching emoji to sticker
description: Disables switching from emoji to sticker search mode in message input field.

name: Hide inbox ads
description: Hides ads in inbox.

name: Unlock subscription features
description: Unlocks "Routes", "Matched Runs" and "Segment Efforts".

name: Remove broadcasts restriction
description: Enables starting/stopping NetGuard via broadcasts.

name: Spoof signature
description: Spoofs the signature of the app.

name: Remove root detection
description: Removes the check for root permissions and unlocked bootloader.

name: Unlock pro
description: Unlocks pro features.

name: Settings
description: Adds ReVanced settings to TikTok.

name: Fix Google login
description: Allows logging in with a Google account.

name: SIM spoof
description: Spoofs the information which is retrieved from the SIM card.

name: Show seekbar
description: Shows progress bar for all video.

name: Playback speed
description: Enables the playback speed option for all videos and retains the speed configurations in between videos.

name: Remember clear display
description: Remembers the clear display configurations in between videos.

name: Downloads
description: Removes download restrictions and changes the default path to download to.

name: Feed filter
description: Removes ads, livestreams, stories, image videos and videos with a specific amount of views or likes from the feed.

name: Remove root detection
description: Removes the check for root permissions and unlocked bootloader.

name: Block video ads
description: Blocks video ads in streams and VODs.

name: Block embedded ads
description: Blocks embedded stream ads using services like Luminous or PurpleAdBlocker.

name: Block audio ads
description: Blocks audio ads in streams and VODs.

name: Settings
description: Adds settings menu to Twitch.

name: Debug mode
description: Enables Twitch's internal debugging mode.

name: Show deleted messages
description: Shows deleted chat messages behind a clickable spoiler.

name: Auto claim channel points
description: Automatically claim Channel Points.

name: Remove bootloader detection
description: Removes the check for an unlocked bootloader.

name: Remove root detection
description: Removes the check for root permissions.

name: Music video ads
description: Removes ads in the music player.

name: Bypass certificate checks
description: Bypasses certificate checks which prevent YouTube Music from working on Android Auto.

name: GmsCore support
description: Allows patched Google apps to run without root and under a different package name by using GmsCore instead of Google Play Services.

options.title: GmsCore Vendor
options.description: The group id of the GmsCore vendor.

name: Permanent repeat
description: Permanently remember your repeating preference even if the playlist ends or another track is played.

name: Permanent shuffle
description: Permanently remember your shuffle preference even if the playlist ends or another track is played.

name: Minimized playback music
description: Enables minimized playback on Kids music.

name: Remove upgrade button
description: Removes the upgrade tab from the pivot bar.

name: Compact header
description: Hides the music category bar at the top of the homepage.

name: Hide get premium
description: Removes all "Get Premium" evidences from the avatar menu.

name: Background play
description: Enables playing music in the background.

name: Exclusive audio playback
description: Enables the option to play audio without video.

name: Codecs unlock
description: Adds more audio codec options. The new audio codecs usually result in better audio quality.

name: Show on lockscreen
description: Shows student id and student ticket on lockscreen.

name: Unlock pro
description: Unlocks all pro features.

name: Change package name
description: Appends ".revanced" to the package name by default. Changing the package name of the app can lead to unexpected issues.

options.title: Package name
options.description: The name of the package to rename the app to.

name: Override certificate pinning
description: Overrides certificate pinning, allowing to inspect traffic via a proxy.

name: Enable Android debugging
description: Enables Android debugging capabilities. This can slow down the app.

name: Remove screen capture restriction
description: Removes the restriction of capturing audio from apps that normally wouldn't allow it.

name: Export all activities
description: Makes all app activities exportable.

name: Predictive back gesture
description: Enables the predictive back gesture introduced on Android 13.

name: Spoof SIM country
description: Spoofs country information returned by the SIM card provider.

options.title: Network ISO Country Code
options.description: ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 country code equivalent for the SIM provider's country code.

options.title: Sim ISO Country Code
options.description: ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 country code equivalent for the SIM provider's country code.

name: Remove screenshot restriction
description: Removes the restriction of taking screenshots in apps that normally wouldn't allow it.

name: Spoof Wi-Fi connection
description: Spoofs an existing Wi-Fi connection.

name: Remove device restrictions
description: Removes restrictions from using the app on any device. Requires mounting patched app over original.

name: Spoof device ID
description: Spoofs device ID to mitigate manual bans by developers.

name: Hide update popup
description: Prevents the update popup from showing up.

name: Hide timeline ads
description: Removes ads from the timeline.

name: Sanitize sharing links
description: Removes (tracking) query parameters from the URLs when sharing links.

name: Spoof client
description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

options.title: OAuth client ID
options.description: The Reddit OAuth client ID. You can get your client ID from https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps. The application type has to be "Installed app" and the redirect URI has to be set to "infinity://localhost".

name: Unlock subscription
description: Unlocks the subscription feature but requires a custom client ID.

name: Spoof client
description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

options.title: OAuth client ID
options.description: The Reddit OAuth client ID. You can get your client ID from https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps. The application type has to be "Installed app" and the redirect URI has to be set to "dbrady://relay".

name: Spoof client
description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

options.title: OAuth client ID
options.description: The Reddit OAuth client ID. You can get your client ID from https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps. The application type has to be "Installed app" and the redirect URI has to be set to "redditisfun://auth".

name: Spoof client
description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

options.title: OAuth client ID
options.description: The Reddit OAuth client ID. You can get your client ID from https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps. The application type has to be "Installed app" and the redirect URI has to be set to "https://127.0.0.1:65023/authorize_callback".

name: Spoof client
description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

options.title: OAuth client ID
options.description: The Reddit OAuth client ID. You can get your client ID from https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps. The application type has to be "Installed app" and the redirect URI has to be set to "http://baconreader.com/auth".

name: Spoof client
description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

options.title: OAuth client ID
options.description: The Reddit OAuth client ID. You can get your client ID from https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps. The application type has to be "Installed app" and the redirect URI has to be set to "http://rubenmayayo.com".

name: Disable Sync for Lemmy bottom sheet
description: Disables the bottom sheet at the startup that asks you to signup to "Sync for Lemmy".

name: Spoof client
description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

options.title: OAuth client ID
options.description: The Reddit OAuth client ID. You can get your client ID from https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps. The application type has to be "Installed app" and the redirect URI has to be set to "http://redditsync/auth".

name: Fix /s/ links
description: Fixes the issue where /s/ links do not work.

name: Spoof client
description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

options.title: OAuth client ID
options.description: The Reddit OAuth client ID. You can get your client ID from https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps. The application type has to be "Installed app" and the redirect URI has to be set to "http://www.ccrama.me".

name: Disable screenshot popup
description: Disables the popup that shows up when taking a screenshot.

name: Hide ads
description: Hides ads.

name: Dynamic color
description: Replaces the default X (Formerly Twitter) Blue with the user's Material You palette.

name: Unlock downloads
description: Unlocks the ability to download any video.

name: Hide view count
description: Hides the view count of Posts.

name: Enable on demand
description: Enables listening to songs on-demand, allowing to play any song from playlists, albums or artists without limitations. This does not remove ads.

name: Hide premium navbar
description: Removes the premium tab from the navbar.

name: Custom theme
description: Applies a custom theme.

options.title: Primary background color
options.description: The background color. Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

options.title: Secondary background color
options.description: The secondary background color. (e.g. search box, artist & podcast). Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

options.title: Accent color
options.description: The accent color ('Spotify green' by default). Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

options.title: Pressed dark theme accent color
options.description: The color when accented buttons are pressed, by default slightly darker than accent. Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

name: Bypass root checks
description: Removes the restriction to use the app with root permissions or on a custom ROM.

name: Remove file size limit
description: Allows opening files larger than 2 MB in the text editor.

name: Promo code unlock
description: Disables the validation of promo code. Any code will work to unlock all features.

name: Remove debugging detection
description: Removes the USB and wireless debugging checks.

name: Remove badge tab
description: Removes the badge tab from the activity tab.

name: Remove notification badge
description: Removes the red notification badge from the activity tab.

name: Hide ads
description: Hides most of the ads across the app.

name: Unlock themes
description: Unlocks all themes that are inaccessible until a certain level is reached.

name: Hide ads
description: Removes general ads.
